entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with rain after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain early in the morning and ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
